name: Miss Piggy's Wedding [A26]
description:
Together the full picture of all the lovely beast ladies with your own hands, play Yakyuken with them, collect their portraits. Hope you have a relaxing and enjoyable game time:)

GAME FEATURES:
- Many different attributes of the lovely beast ladies
- - The most classic YAKYUKEN
- - - more Super puzzle challenge levels

Install the free DLC to unlock some adult content :)

Thank you very much for supporting this game.
If you like this game, please recommend it, thank you again!
